Nenhum evento agendado
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-events', templateUrl: './events.component.html', styleUrls: ['./events.component.scss'], }) export class EventsComponent implements OnInit { public events: any = []; widthImg: number = 150; paddingImg: number = 2; showImage: boolean = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getEvents(); } alterImage() { this.showImage = !this.showImage; } public getEvents(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/events').subscribe( response => this.events = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
